de.ityx.ocr.ocrservice.vocr.training

Class VOCRTrainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ityx.ocr.ocrservice.vocr.training.VOCRTrainer

  • public class VOCRTrainer
extends Object
    Implements workflows for creating and evaluating a VOCRModel. The vocr (virtual ocr) tries to improve the capturing process by combining two or more OCR engines. The results of the OCR engines are overlaid by matching and merging the segmentation results, i.e., the bounding boxes and the CharacterAlternatives, respectively. Therefore a list of VOCRTrainset instances must be provided that contain merged CharacterAlternatives, e.g., by the NonGreedyCharacterAlternativeMerger.
    For creating and evaluating the vocr engine, all given CharacterAlternatives must be (manually) labeled, e.g., in the vocr examination tool, to indicate the ground truth in the given bounding box. There are two labels indicating special cases:
    • [UNKNOWN] - CharacterAlternatives instances for which no character label can be assigned to, e.g., because one cannot distinguish the ground truth character, must be labeled with [UNKNOWN]. CharacterAlternatives instances with this label are not incorporated in the training and evaluation procedure.
    • [GARBAGE] - CharacterAlternatives instances covering an area in the image that do not contain a typewritten character, i.e., a form element, an artefact or a handwritten character.

    The method trainWithErrorModel(java.util.List, String) trains and creates the VOCRModel. The resulting model can be fed to an instance of VotingCharacterDecision to retrieve the vocr predictions. To evaluate the model beforehand the method evaluate(java.util.List, de.ityx.ocr.ocrservice.vocr.persistence.VOCRModel) can be used that returns performance metrics for each OCR engine and the vocr.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VOCRTrainer

        public VOCRTrainer(de.ityx.vocr.classification.ClassifierFactory classifierFactory)

        Parameters:
        classifierFactory - a ClassifierFactory implementation that should be used for creating the VOCRModel.

    • Method Detail

      • trainWithErrorModel

        public VOCRModel trainWithErrorModel(List<VOCRTrainset> trainsets,
                            String profileName)
        Creates a VOCR model based on the given list of VOCRTrainset instances. The given VOCRTrainset instances contain the predictions of one or more OCR engines which are merged beforehand, e.g., by the NonGreedyCharacterAlternativeMerger, if more than one OCR engine is present. The CharacterAlternatives in the VOCRTrainset instances are manually labeled, e.g., in the VOCR examination tool and used to create a VOCRModel that can be fed to the VotingCharacterDecision or evaluate(java.util.List, de.ityx.ocr.ocrservice.vocr.persistence.VOCRModel) to evaluate the created model. There are two labels for special cases that can be assigned to the CharacterAlternatives:
        • [UNKNOWN] - CharacterAlternatives instances for which no character label can be assigned to, e.g., because one cannot distinguish the ground truth character, must be labeled with [UNKNOWN]. CharacterAlternatives instances with this label are not incorporated in the training procedure.
        • [GARBAGE] - CharacterAlternatives instances covering an area in the image that do not contain a typewritten character, i.e., a form element, an artefact or a handwritten character.
        Parameters:
        trainsets - a list of merged VOCRTrainset instances that are manually labeled
        profileName - the profile name identifying the VOCRModel to be created.
        Returns:
        a VOCRModel instance that is created by this training procedure.

      • evaluate

        public Map<String,de.ityx.libnki.evaluation.performance.PerformanceMetricsMultiClass<String>> evaluate(List<VOCRTrainset> trainsets,
                                                                                              VOCRModel vocrModel)
        Evaluates the given VOCRModel with the given list of VOCRTrainset instances. For each OCR engine that is observed in trainWithErrorModel(java.util.List, String) and the virtual OCR engine a PerformanceMetricsMultiClass instance is created and the performance is tracked.
        CharacterAlternatives that are labeled as [UNKNOWN] are skipped and not evaluated.
        Parameters:
        trainsets - a list of merged VOCRTrainset instances that are manually labeled
        vocrModel - a VOCRModel instance that is created beforehand
        Returns:
        a Map that maps each OCR and the VOCR engine with the corresponding PerformanceMetricsMultiClass. The performance of the VOCR engine is mapped to the key VOCR_NAME

      • getFeatureGenerators

        public List<FeatureGenerator> getFeatureGenerators()
        Returns the given list of FeatureGenerator instances.
        Returns:
        a List of FeatureGenerator instances.

      • setFeatureGenerators

        public void setFeatureGenerators(List<FeatureGenerator> featureGenerators)
        Sets a list of FeatureGenerator instances that is used to create a SparseVector from the individual OCR engine results in a CharacterAlternatives instance.
        Parameters:
        featureGenerators - a List of FeatureGenerator instances.
